name: Bai Yi
info: A Sinner adept at breaking Cores. Can deal multiple Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.

media.title: JP Bai Yi Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

maniaIntensifyText: Upon breaking a Core, CRIT Rate is increased by 50% for 10 seconds. This effect cannot be stacked by breaking a Core multiple times.
criminalRecord:
The owner of shell company //Whitestone Industries//, the subject engaged in illegal businesses such as debt collection and hired thug recruitment. The subject has indirectly participated in all sorts of violent and illegal activities over a hundred times, causing massive property damage as well as posing an immeasurable threat to the Syndican region's stability.

The subject claims to have grown up in Syndicate, but no records concerning the identity //Bai Yi// dated before N.F. 105 can be found, so the subject is suspected to have forged her identity to cover up other crimes.

--

Although the subject remains sluggish and noncompliant after her arrest, she's ceased all illegal activities, both personal and under the name of Whitestone Industries. Currently, all three members of the company, Bai Yi, K.K., and Che, are stable and happy about their newfound life security and the fact that they don't need to exhaust themselves with work anymore. They show no tendency or possibility of escape.

It's confirmed that the subject has no other aliases or criminal records except those that are already on file. The only new discovery is that the subject may be related to //Parma//.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The power supports the subject's movement at supersonic speed while maintaining impressive presciseness. Equipped with her sword named //Halo//, the subject can vanquish dozens of enemies within three seconds. Seeing that the record is still being broken constantly, the subject possesses unimaginable potential.

+++* Awakening Signs
The subject seems to have awakened years ago, but no available means can accurately deduce the time she first used her power and the reason for her awakening is still unknown.

+++* Corruption State
Despite the subject's potent power, no Mania symptoms can be detected in her unless through advanced screening and lab analysis. The subject's condition seriously contradicts existing Mania level patterns and its cause is still to be investigated.
ecbFlavourText:
"We made it out, Che."
"Now it's time to greet a better tomorrow!"
interrogation1:
Having failed to turn up any information on Whitestone Industries, the Chief interrogates Bai Yi directly. She forces the Chief to download Whitestone Industries' app via a QR code on her chest and boasts about the company's capabilities, but is forced by K.K.'s contradicting testimony to admit that she is a liar and the company is in dire straits. When questioned about Zoya's whereabouts and her activities during BR-004, Bai Yi feigns ignorance. However, the Chief's questions about a man claiming to work for Whitestone Industries when apprehended for smuggling [[[Mania]]] weapons causes her to fly into a rage and promise revenge against anyone posing as a member of her company. She convinces the Chief to team up with her to achieve their mutual goal of punishing the impostors and stopping the smuggling of Mania weapons.

Bai Yi is very sly. She has not given you much useful info. Instead, she drags you into trouble. However, she might blow her own cover because of it.
interrogation2:
Despite Bai Yi's bravado, on the day of the operation, she becomes badly sick on the day of the operation into and forces the [[[MBCC]]] elite response team to go ahead without her while she is confined to the bathroom. When their cover is blown attempting to infiltrate the fake Whitestone Industries, Bai Yi appears on her motorcycle to rescue the Chief.

You're safe. After some short planning, you decide to go back to save K.K. and Che.
interrogation3:
Despite still being badly ill, Bai Yi and the Chief sneak back into the fake Whitestone through the ventilation ducts. She breaks into Boss Bai office to vomit and knocks him out. Upon realizing that he is the one impersonating her, Bai Yi beats and threatens him, interrogating him about the whereabouts of her subordinates. She and the Boss uncover that after losing his business in [[[Eastside]]], "Boss Bai" was paid by a mysterious individual to come to Syndicate and establish a Mania weapon smuggling operation, under the one condition that it go by the name of Whitestone Industries.

You made it. You and the Whitestone Industries team are all safe. But are things really what they seem to be? Probably not.
interrogation4:
The Chief ponders who would have set up the fake Whitestone as a trap for Bai Yi, and why. They say that her one flaw as an actor is being too eager to prove that she is a harmless good-for-nothing, and resolves to play along until the time comes to expose her for who she is. To this end, the MBCC attempts to capture [[[List of Minor Characters |Rhett Bai]]] as he flees back to Eastside. They find him unconscious and restrained after his room was clearly broken into. "Boss Bai" had been attempting to make a tell-all video when he was assaulted, though the recording does not show his attacker, the speed of their movements and the sound of blades heavily imply that it was Bai Yi, covering up whatever circumstances led Rhett Bai to Syndicate. The Chief follows the trail of blood from Rhett's window, but Bai Yi's voice is heard in the darkness, saying that she admires their bravery, but bravery alone is not enough. She claims to be protecting dangerous secrets, which will bring everything the Chief values under threat if they are ever learned. She says that the Chief eventually will have to know, but not now, and that they should go home and enjoy the rest of their peaceful days. Back at the Bureau, Bai Yi is failing to make money by convincing other Sinners to scan her QR code -- with K.K. injured, she needs to work, but [[[Hella]]] says that everybody knows that her app forced the Chief to get a new terminal. Bai Yi tells the Chief that she and Che are keeping things from K.K. because they don't want her to be dragged into their mess. She admits to having been at Keylan Square during BR-004, but refuses to tell the Chief Zoya's whereabouts.

No matter what the real identity of Bai Yi, no matter what she's been hiding, you will find out the truth. Howeer, it's really not time yet... Maybe.
arrestRec1: The subject accidentally bumped into the MBCC's patrol while evading debt collectors, injuring several people. Later, a surveillance check suggested that this person showed signs of possessing Sinner power, and the subject was arrested after confirmation.
arrestRec2: The database denied the MBCC's request to access the subject's early records, and the subject is unwilling to provide relevant information. There has been no progress on the investigation of the subject's childhood and family background.
arrestRec3: With limited access to the subject's records, it's currently only known that before settling in Syndicate, the subject apparently changed identities frequently to evade an unknown power hunting her down. After settling down in Syndicate, the subject started running //Whitestone Industries// with Che and K.K., taking the role of the company's owner. The company has since been on the verge of bankruptcy multiple times.
arrestRec4: The subject hides her past and her true levels of power under her playful and frivolous appearance. Her real identity, and the mysterious individuals hunting her down when she's after the fake Whitestone Industries require further investigations.
servingTerm1: In stark contrast to her appalling power, the subject is unenthusiastic about all basic job duties and assigned missions and completely lacks the concept of time. There has been no improvement even after repeated warnings.
servingTerm2: Having taken miscellaneous jobs like hired thug, delivery worker, and missing person searcher in the past, the subject is very willing to share her seasoned work experience with other Sinners. But as the subject's sharing often reflects questionable personal values, these chats have been interrupted by staff many times.
servingTerm3: Skilled at making her own drinks with various grains and unknown ingredients, but never sells them and only shares them with other Sinners within a certain range. Among them, a drink named //Moonlight Baby// has received many praises and won the subject quite a few friends in the Bureau.
servingTerm4: Have made several attempts to sell //Whitestone Industries//'s shares to people around her, but in vain. Out of compassion and encouragement, the Chief has bought a small number of shares. To show her gratitude, the subject has suggested partnership with the Chief to bind their interests together. The Chief has no responded so far.
emotionCheck1:
[Someone kicks open your office door.]

**Bai Yi:** Morning Chief, when are you going to pay the bill from last time?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Mrs. Bai, the bills last time were already settled.
 * **Bai Yi:** Well, what about... the extra labor fee?
 * **Bai Yi:** 😏😏😏

* **Prompt:**  What is it? Something about the pay again?
 * **Bai Yi:** Well... the labor expense for packaging!
 * **Bai Yi:** 😏😏😏
emotionCheck2:
[Bai Yi is drowning her sorrows in her room.]

**Bai Yi:** Ah... We're seeing a budget deficit again this month.

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Ummm, if nothing else works, there's the last resort, selling Whitestone Industries.
 * **Bai Yi:** Chief! Will you not lend me any money?
 * **Bai Yi:** 😖😖😉

* **Prompt:**  You should start working more and drinking less.
 * **Bai Yi:** You're right. You've got to show what you're made of once in a while.
 * **Bai Yi:** 😏
supervision1:
++* ⚠ Profit Share

//On behalf of Whitestone Industries, Bai Yi wants to have a word with you.//

**System Notifications:** Bai Yi promised to give you a "share" of the Whitestone Industries earnings that month. In exchange, you will help them develop their business.

* **Prompt:** Approve
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Smuggled Goods

//The Bureau began a temporary spot check on several Sinners.//

**System Notifications:** In the surprise spot check, you intercepted some goods Bai Yi was smuggling.

* **Prompt:** Submit the goods to higher-ups
supervision3:
++* ⚠⚠ Drinking Causes Trouble

//Bai Yi has been waiting in the Confinement Cell for some time now.//

**System Notifications:** Bai Yi has been waiting in the Confinement Cell for some time now.

* **Prompt:** Wake her

**Chief:** Bai Yi!

**Bai Yi:** ...If you want to talk business, talk to K.K. If it's about payment, find Che... Leave me alone.

**Bai Yi:** I'm just going to take a nap...

**System Notifications:** She already said that six hours ago.

**Bai Yi:** It's just six hours... Wait, what? It's been six hours?

* **Prompt:** Laugh at her

**Chief:** Congratulations, you missed the entire operation. And you can forget about the rewards we discussed yesterday. What a shame.

**Bai Yi:** No! Not like this!

**Bai Yi:** I'll never drink before going on a mission ever again...

**Bai Yi:** Well... my dearest Chief, what about the rewards this time...?

* **Prompt:** Reject

**Bai Yi:** But K.K. and Che were there. And the problems were probably settled already.

**Chief:** Yes, but what does that have to do with you?

**Bai Yi:** I'm their boss! All of their payments go through me.

* **Prompt:** Let them handle it themselves

**Chief:** I've already given them what they are owed. You'll have to ask them for that.

**Bai Yi:** Che, K.K., how dare you work for extra income without telling me. Give me the money, now!
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Secret Exchange

//Bai Yi greets you in the Outdoor Activity Area.//

**System Notifications:** Bai Yi greets you in the Outdoor Activity Area.

**Bai Yi:** Hi, Chief!

**Bai Yi:** Come here.

* **Prompt:** ...What?

**Bai Yi:** I have a nice batch in Syndicate. If you can offer me the right price, I'll bring it back to you.

**Chief:** [[[List of Minor Characters |Faye]]] is in charge of the Bureau's supply management. You can go ahead and talk to [[[Nightingale]]] and Faye. And we can go through the standard business process if anything's needed.

**Bai Yi:** There's no way I'm going to talk to those two girls.

**Bai Yi:** Hey, I also have quite some secret intelligence. Would you like to know? Give me money and I'll tell you all about it.

* **Prompt:** This is compulsory.

**Chief:** It is supposed to be your duty as a Sinner to report important intel to the Bureau...

**Bai Yi:** Oh, come on. Are you going to give me the money or not?

**System Notifications:** In yesterday's report, K.K. complained about how Bai Yi sneaked out while on a mission.

* **Prompt:** Decline again.

**Chief:** It's not happening. And did you run away to play last time?

**Bai Yi:** Hahaha. What are you talking about? I don't understand anything you just said. Hahaha.

**Bai Yi:** Ah, I just recalled there is something I need to do.

**Bai Yi:** I'll see you around! (gives a flying kiss)
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Ads

//Whitestone Industries' ad stickers are constantly found everywhere in the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: Bai Yi has been waiting outside your office for a long time. Permit entry?

* **Prompt:** Please come in.

**Bai Yi:** Do you need something? Dear Chief?

* **Prompt:** It's about the ads.

**Chief:** I want to talk with you, about the ads of Whitestone Industries.

**Bai Yi:** Do you? Have you finally decided to sponsor Whitestone Industries?

**Bai Yi:** Wow, my most sincere thanks! Our company accepts all kinds of organizational and personal donations! You can swipe your card and pay here.

* **Prompt:** Posting ads is forbidden.

**Chief:** Whitestone Industries' ads are spotted everywhere in the Bureau now, and they're really difficult to remove. If you post any more of those stickers around, I'll send you to the Confinement Cell.

**Bai Yi:** Looks like Che and K.K. have indeed been working hard to expand our business... I can't be left behind.

**Bai Yi:** Chief, if you want to get rid of the ads problem in the Bureau once and for all, please take my business card.

**Bai Yi:** Whitestone Industries can solve all your problems.

* **Prompt:** Swipe and pay
 * **Bai Yi:** Chief, you did make a payment! Amazing!
 * **Bai Yi:** Thanks for your support. Love ya!
 * **Chief:** Did I just fall for her trick...

* **Prompt:** Call the guards
 * **Bai Yi:** What? Are you serious about sending me to the Confinement Cell?
 * **Bai Yi:** Sorry, I just thought of something I have to finish. Now will you excuse me?
 * **System Notifications:** Bai Yi left at lightning speed.
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Hotpot for Three

//Warning, risk of fire detected in the chamber.//

**System Notifications:** Warning, risk of fire detected in the Energy Furnace. Go and check?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**System Notifications:** When you arrive at the furnace, you find Bai Yi, Che, and K.K. having hotpot.

**Bai Yi:** Oops, Chief, you caught us.

* **Prompt:** Open flames are banned in the Bureau.

**Bai Yi:** Sigh, but we don't have a choice. The food in the cafeteria is so dry. We've gotta help ourselves to a little extra treat.

**Bai Yi:** What do you say? Wanna join us?

* **Prompt:** Join them
 * **Bai Yi:** Haha, I know you'll understand, Chief. Here, I've saved the last bite of meat for you.
 * **Bai Yi:** I really want you to join Whitestone Industries as our fourth employee. What do you think? Give it some thought?
 * **System Notifications:** Footsteps can be heard in the corridor.
 * **Bai Yi:** Hmm? That sounds like... [[[Nightingale]]]?
 * **Bai Yi:** Crap, we need to get out of here! Chief, you hold her off!

* **Prompt:** Stand firm
 * **Bai Yi:** Ha, I like that about you. You always stick to your own principles no matter what.
 * **Bai Yi:** In that case, I won't hold back anymore.
 * **System Notifications:** Like a white lightning bolt, Bai Yi gobbles down the remaining food.
 * **Prompt:** ...
 * **Chief:** I didn't know your ability could be used for this as well.
mirage:
++++* White Night

//Gazing at the foreboding line of defense, her limbs are overcome with dread.
She hopes for a ray of light to light up this dark night.//

In a dark alley, the Chief encounters Bai Yi, head deep in thought. She notices them and urges them to go away, saying that the place is not safe and that she needs to go save Che and K.K.'s lives. An announcement from a loudspeaker threatens her to come face her death, or else allow her friends to die. She is more serious and uncomfortable than the Chief has ever seen her, so they follow her.

Che and K.K. are unconscious and breathing shallowly. A shadow appears and mocks Bai Yi's anger, saying that it is surprised that after she has betrayed so many companions, Bai Yi can still say that she cherishes the two of them. It tells her never to dream of getting rid of her past. The Chief stops her from rushing forward into the countless shadows before them. Bai Yi agrees to follow the Chief's plan, but insists that if it fails, she will do anything it takes to rescue them -- even if that means they all die together.

The monsters in the maze scream Bai Yi's name and chant "Sacrifice!" One is torn apart, and the other feast on its body.

A monster with a sewn-on human face attempts to kill Che with an axe, accusing Bai Yi of having done something similar in the past. Che has been tortured to the point that he can't move an inch.

A monster, seeing Bai Yi, calls out in fear for help, only to be swiftly silenced by her blade. She says that their kindness is merely a trick. Another monster covered in scars also seems afraid, threatening to shoot K.K. if Bai Yi approaches. It says that killing the traitor Bai Yi would avenge its friends' deaths and changes focus to her, giving her an opening to kill it. K.K. is tied to an electric chair, barely breathing.

The final monster guarding the exit of the mirage manages to cut Bai Yi's wrist with its longsword. The monster is surprised to see her, believing her to be long dead. Together, Bai Yi and the Chief kill the monster.

Outside the mirage, the Chief is drinking with the three Whitestone employees, having spaced out for a few minutes. Seeing the three of them having a good time puts the Chief at a loss for words. They remark that they wonder which is the real Bai Yi, but the others dismiss the question. Recalling the last monster's words, the Chief wonders if technology that can resurrect the dead exists in the DisCity. Bai Yi laughs and changes the subject, forcing the Chief to drink more. Drunk, they eventually pass out, but not before noticing a scar on Bai Yi's wrist.

//Specks of light flicker in the long, dark night. "It's not bad to do this every once in a while." She sips her beer and gazes out the window.//
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Alright, alright. I'll indulge you with a little fun. After all... the way you're trailing after me is just too adorable.

[Raise to Phase 1]
It's only natural that the owner of Whitestone Industries is highly competent.

[Raise to Phase 3]
You've got to show what you're made of once in a while. Am I right, Chief?

[Level Start]
Come grab a drink with me when it's done.

[Win Battles]
The job is done! Shall we sort out the pay?

[Lose Battles]
When there's a will, there's a—which way is the exit?

[Ultimate Skill]
You are all done for.

[Die in Battles]
Take care of them... please...

[Greeting]
MBCC's Whitestone Branch at your service! If you drop by, I'll offer you a special 20% off. Shush... don't let K.K. know.

[Conversation 1]
Time for bed. I've earned it, haven't I? I've been working so //hard// for you, Chief.

[Conversation 2]
I'm faster than lightning when I want to be. You won't be able to stop me. Hmm, you think I'm bluffing? Try setting me free and see for yourself then.

[Conversation 3]
Whitestone is able to survive in Syndicate till today because I've poured by blood, sweat and tears into this company. You really can't count on those two kids, for heaven's sake... Why are you looking at me like this? Am I not speaking the truth?

[Special Conversation 1]
I don't have any virtuous faith. I'm happy enough to be able to protect those around me. I don't want to lose anyone ever again.

[Special Conversation 2]
Half of those //scan code and save 10 DisCoins on your order// ads in the city are posted by me. I've been to every corner of DisCity, and I know about the things you want to investigate. Wanna hear it? ...Well, pay up!

[Special Conversation 3]
Underground city? Why on earth are you always looking into this sort of thing... Has anyone seen it? If no one has seen it, that means it's fake. Or... no one who's entered it has made it out alive.

[Full Compliance]
I don't like working hard, but I do like hard-working people. People like K.K., Che... and you. Trust me, your hard effort won't go to waste—I won't let that happen.

[Idle]
The meals here are pretty good. I don't need to repay my debts here. Also, the landlord can't just barge in. Nice, nice... It's decided, I'm not leaving!

[Annoyed]
Oh? How unusual. Are you taking the lead today? In that case, let's have some fun...

[Special Attention]
Are you so eager to be close to me? Oh my, such an honest kid.

[Dispatch]
Does this count as a job? You know the drill, I won't work for free.

[Dispatch Complete]
Phew... Should have asked K.K. to settle this for me...

[Level Up]
Whatever you say, whatever you need.

[Pat Head]
Handsy. Fancy going for a ride with me, Chief?
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
So you finally found out. Don't be shocked. Syndicate has quite a few dank rats lurking in the dark. Someone's got to deal with them. It's really no trouble for me.

[Greeting]
You're finally back. I stayed here and didn't go out all this time when you were gone... Oh, you want to know about the stains on my cloak? Che accidentally spilled water on it. Yeah, that must be it.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Errands? What errands would a decent person have this late... I simply enjoy walking around at night. Yup, that's all.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
There is a restaurant nearby. Their braised beef goes well with wine. Let's grab a drink together?

[Ordinary Contact 3]
With how sad steps, O Moon, thou climb'st in the skies... What a beautiful night to sweep away vice.

**Note:** She is quoting from the poem 鄂州南楼书事 by Huang Tingjian, a poet from the Song Dynasty, who wrote this poem while in political exile.

[Ordinary Contact 4]
If you slash a blade fast enough, an afterimage will linger in its place. Beautiful, isn't it?

[Idle] 
Hmm, this familiar stench... Is it coming from over there?

[Special Attention] 
Is this meant to... surveil me? Which do you think is faster, the speed of my movement or the blink of your eye?

[Level Up}
The faster the blade, the fewer problems there are.

[Pat Head]
These hair accessories all have their own purposes. Be careful not to cut your hands.
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
Believe me, I've really been to the sea! I chartered a luxury yacht and found a lot of treasures there... (Chuckles) K.K. and Che were there, too! They can vouch for me!

[Greeting]
Done resting? Let's head out, then. There are still lots of treasures at the bottom of the sea waiting for us to salvage.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
You know, my boat back then was unparalleled. Powerful, luxurious, and decked out with every gadget you can possibly imagine... What's that look? Don't believe I used to be rich?

[Ordinary Contact 2]
It can get dangerous at times on the sea. There are storms, pirates, and sharks. But fear not. To me, those are just little hiccups on the road to fortune.

[Ordinary Contact 3]
Can I swim? Ha! I can swim like a little mermaid, so fast, so graceful! Anyone sees that should pay me. You'll understand once I get into the water.

[Ordinary Contact 4]
Phew, the sun is scorching. I'm getting all hot and sweaty... Aww, how come you're blushing?

[Idle] 
Ah... Take a nap on the deck if you're tired. The sun is so warm, and the sea breeze feels so nice...

[Special Attention] 
All right, all hands on deck. We're heading to deeper waters!

[Level Up}
Hehe, afterwards, I found even more treasures.

[Pat Head]
When you're alone on a boat with a hot babe like me, your imagination is bound to run wild. It's fine, I forgive you.
nightmareTalent: All allied Sinners gain 1 Energy each time they deal a CRIT with a Normal Attack. Each allied Sinner can trigger this effect up to once every 3 seconds.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Buried Underground
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When Bai Yi's CRIT Rate exceeds 100%, each 1% of excess CRIT Rate will be turned into 0.6%/0.8%/1% Attack.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"We made it out, Che."
"Now it's time to greet a better tomorrow!"

maniaIntensify.title: Gust
maniaIntensify.text: Upon breaking a Core, CRIT Rate is increased by 50% for 10 seconds, This effect cannot be stacked by breaking a Core multiple times.

guide.title: Summary
guide.text:
Bai Yi seems more like an assassin Corebreak unit at first glance, but is actually a strong continuous single target damage dealer that ramps up over time. This makes her great for ToA, though it does take a lot of attention to pull it off.

In general, you need to use her ult and then move her every 9 seconds to stack the CRIT Rate buff. If you manage to ult again before you run out of your 3 ult moves, you can stack the buff indefinitely. (Check the guide above for a in-depth explanation how to pilot Bai Yi.)

pros: Can do 6 Core Dmg on her own
High dmg potential in long battles
S1 recovers movement count over time

crimebrandSets.name: Tower + Inversion
crimebrandSets.note: Overthrown Tower's additional Crit Rate allows Bai to ramp beyond 100% Crit Rate for her ECB ATK bonus faster; Inversion's energy gain increases consistency in recovering her Ultimate so you can continue to Crit stack.

crimebrandSets.name: Reunion Day
crimebrandSets.note: Reunion Day's energy gain synergises with Bai due to activating on Crit, and Bai needs the energy consistency to recover her Ultimate so you can continue to Crit stack. Use this if you are using Overthrown Tower/Inversion Slash set on somebody else.

shackles.title: Fleet-footed
shackles.description: After the start of the battle, recovers 1 Movement Count every 15 seconds.

shackles.title: Draw Sword
shackles.description: [Poised] The required immobility duration is reduced to 8 seconds.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Shadow Attack
skills.description:
Bai Yi attacks with her two swords.

The 1st and 2nd attacks: She quickly swings her swords, dealing (Attack*60%) Physical Damage.
The 3rd attack: She performs swift spin attacks, dealing a total of (Attack*105%) Physical Damage each time.

upgrade.description: The Damage of the $0st and $0nd attacks are increased to $0% , and the $0rd stage attack multiplier is increased to $0%.

skills.name: Tempest
skills.description:
Bai Yi maxes out her speed, dealing (200% of Attack damage) Physical Damage and 1 Core Damage to all enemies within a cross area around her target grid upon her next 3 movements.
Every time Bai Yi moves via this skill, she gains a 15% CRIT Rate bonus for 10 seconds. The effect can be stacked.

skills.name: Efficient Raid
skills.description:
Bai Yi becomes [Poised] if she stayed put for 10 seconds. The effect can stack up to 2 times.
Moving when she's [Poised] grants Bai Yi a (6%*number of [Poised] stacks) Attack bonus for 10 seconds.

upgrade.description: Attack bonus granted by a stack is increased to $0%.

skills.name: Warmup Exercise
skills.description: Bai Yi's CRIT Rate increases by 20%. When dealing a critical hit, she gains 1 Energy (she can do this once every 4 seconds).

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Attack +6
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +6, Unlock Mission: Dispatch Bai Yi 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlocking Task: Replace Bai Yi - Upgrade to Outdoor Supervision Object
Unlock Voice: Full Compliancey up, Unlock Sinner Title: Wind Chaser

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: Alright, alright, I'll indulge you with a little fun. After all... the way you're trailing after me is just too adorable.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: あはは、いいわよ。付き合ってあげる。だって……必死になってあたしを追いかけるなんて、可愛くてしょうがないもの。
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 와서 잠깐 놀아줄게. 어쨌든… 날 열심히 쫓아다니는 모습이 너무 귀여우니까.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 就来这儿陪你玩玩吧。毕竟……你努力追赶我的样子，实在太可爱了。
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 就來這陪你玩玩吧。畢竟……你努力追趕我的樣子，實在太可愛了。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: It's only natural that the owner of Whitestone Industries is highly competent.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: 白記事務所の社長になりたいなら、それなりの能力がいるわ。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 백기실업의 사장이 되려면, 당연히 어느 정도 능력이 받쳐줘야지!
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 想当白记实业的老板，当然要有点本事。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 想當白記實業的老闆，當然要有點本事。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: You've got to show what you're made of once in a while. Am I right, Chief?
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: たまには真面目にやらないと。ね、局長？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 가끔은 진지한 면도 보여줘야지, 안 그래, 국장?
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 偶尔也得拿出点认真劲儿，你说对吧？局长。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 偶爾也得拿出點認真的表現，你說對吧？局長。
voicelines.Level Start - EN: Come grab a drink with me when it's done.
voicelines.Level Start - JP: 終わったら飲みに付き合ってくれるわよね。
voicelines.Level Start - CN: 完工之后记得陪我喝几杯。
voicelines.Level Start - TW: 完工之後記得陪我喝幾杯。
voicelines.Win Battles - EN: The job is done! Shall we sort out the pay?
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: お仕事完了！報酬の計算に、入るわよー？
voicelines.Win Battles - KR: 오늘 할 일 끝~! 어디 보자… 일당이…?
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: When there's a will, there's a—which way is the exit?
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: 木々の茂る山がある限り——ここで死闘することなくない？
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - JP: もう——逃げられないわよ。
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: あいつらの面倒を見てやって……お願い……。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: MBCC's Whitestone Branch at your service! If you drop by, I'll offer you a special 20% off. Shush... don't let K.K. know.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: MBCC白記支店は誠心誠意、サービスさせていただきます——きみなら、2割引きでいいわ。しっ……K.K.には内緒よ。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: MBCC 백기분점입니다. 당신에겐 언제나 20%를 할인해 드리겠습니다. 쉿… K.K.한테는 비밀입니다.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: MBCC白记分店竭诚为您服务——你来的话，打八折哦。嘘……别告诉蔻蔻。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: MBCC白記分店竭誠為您服務——你來的話，打八折哦。噓……別告訴K.K.。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: Time for bed. I've earned it, haven't I? I've been working so hard for you, Chief.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: もう寝る時間だわ。いいでしょ？局長のために、あたしはあーんなに努力したんだから。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 잘 시간이야. 이제 됐잖아~! 국장~ 너를 위해 난 이미 엄청 노력했다고.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 睡觉时间到。可以的吧，局长？为了你，我已经那——么努力了。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 睡覺時間到。可以的吧，局長？為了你，我已經那——麼努力了。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: I'm faster than lightning when I want to be. You won't be able to stop me. Hmm, you think I'm bluffing? Try setting me free and see for yourself then.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 本気になったら稲妻より速く走れるわよ。きみなんかには止められないわ。信じられない？じゃあ出してあげようか？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 내가 진지하게 하면 번개보다 더 빠르게 움직일 수 있어, 너는 도저히 막을 수 없을걸? 왜? 못 믿어? 그럼 한 번 그냥 내보내 줘보던가~
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 我认真起来，能比闪电还快，你呀，根本拦不住。怎么，不相信？那就放我出去试试呀~
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 我認真起來，能比閃電還快，你呀，根本攔不住。怎麼，不相信？那就放我出去試試呀~
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: Whitestone is able to survive in Syndicate till today because I've poured my blood, sweat, and tears into this company. You really can't count on those two kids, for heaven's sake... Why are you looking at me like this? Am I not speaking the truth?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: この白記という会社が、シンジケートで今まで存在してこられたのは、ボスであるあたしが奔走したからなの。あのガキ二人は本当に頼りにならないんだから。もう……何でそんな目であたしを見てるの？あたし何か変なこと言った？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 백기 이 회사가 신디케이트에서 지금까지 살아남을 수 있었던 것은, 전~부 이 백사장님이 동분서주 발로 뛰었기 때문이야. 그 두 꼬맹이는 믿을 수가 없다니까, 정말?… 뭐… 뭔데? 왜 그렇게 쳐다보는 거야? 내가 뭐 잘 못 말했니?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 白记这公司，能在辛迪加活到现在，全靠我这个老板奔波养家。那两个小鬼太靠不住了，真是的……你干嘛这么看着我，我说错什么了吗？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 白記這公司，能在辛迪加活到現在，全靠我這個老闆奔波養家。那兩個小鬼太靠不住了，真是的……你幹嘛這麼看著我，我說錯什麼了嗎？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: I don't have any virtuous faith. I'm happy enough to be able to protect those around me. I don't want to lose anyone ever again.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: あたしには崇高な信念なんてないわ。周りの人を守ることができればそれで十分なの。……もう誰も失いたくないから。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 나는 어떤 숭고한 신앙도 가지고 있지 않아, 그저 곁에 있는 사람들을 지켜낼 수 있으면 그걸로 충분해. 다시는 그 누구도 잃고 싶지 않아.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 我没有什么崇高的信仰，能守护好身边的人就足够了。我再也不想失去任何人了。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 我沒有什麼崇高的信仰，能守護好身邊的人就足夠了。我再也不想失去任何人了。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: Half of those scan code and save 10 DisCoins on your order ads in the city are posted by me. I've been to every corner of the DisCity, and I know about the things you want to investigate. Wanna hear it? ...Well, pay up!
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 「初回依頼限定のお得価格！」ってチラシの半分は、あたしが貼ったものなの。ディスシティなら知らないところはないわ。きみが調査したい場所もあたしは全部知ってるわよ。聞きたい？……お金を出すなら教えてあげる！
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 시내의 그런 '첫 임무 위탁 시 10% 할인'이라는 작은 광고의 반은 내가 붙인 것일걸? 디스시티 구석구석 다 가봤어. 네가 조사하고 싶은 건 나도 다 알고 있어. 듣고 싶으면… 돈을 내!
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 城里那种“扫码下单立减十元”的小广告，一半都是我贴的。狄斯城所有的角落我都去过，你想调查的事，我也都知道。你想听吗……给钱呀！
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 城裡那種「掃碼下單立減十元」的小廣告，一半都是我貼的。狄斯城所有的角落我都去過，你想調查的事，我也都知道。你想聽嗎……給錢呀！
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: Underground city? Why on earth are you always looking into this sort of thing... Has anyone seen it? If no one has seen it, that means it's fake. Or... no one who's entered it has made it out alive.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 地底の城？はは、きみってどうしていつもそんなものについてばかり聞くの？誰か見た人がいる？誰も見たことがないなら偽物ね。でないなら……入った人が、みんな生きて帰ってこられなかったということだわ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 땅속 도시? 왜 이런 걸 알아보는 걸 좋아해? 생각을 해 봐, 본 사람이 있어? 본 사람이 없다면 그건 가짜잖아? 아니면… 살아서 돌아온 사람이 아무도 없거나…
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 地底之城？你怎么老喜欢打听这种东西，有人见过吗？没人见过就是假的嘛。不然……就是进去的人，都没能活着回来。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 地底之城？你怎麼老喜歡打聽這種東西，有人見過嗎？沒人見過就是假的嘛。不然……就是進去的人，都沒能活著回來。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: I don't like working hard, but I do like hard-working people. People like K.K., Che... and you. Trust me, your hard effort won't go to waste—I won't let that happen.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 努力するのは嫌いなの。でも、努力している人は好きよ。例えばK.K.、澈……そして、きみ。あたしを信じて。きみたちの努力は無駄にはならないわ——あたしが無駄にはさせない。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 나는 노력하는 것을 좋아하지 않지만 노력하는 사람을 좋아하지. 예를 들어 K.K., 치이… 그리고 국장, 날 믿어봐! 믿음이 헛되지 않도록 해줄게!
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 我不喜欢努力，但我喜欢努力的人。比如蔻蔻，澈……还有你。相信我，你们的努力不会白费的——我不会让它白费的。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 我不喜歡努力，但我喜歡努力的人。比如K.K.，澈……還有你。相信我，你們的努力不會白費的——我不會讓它白費的。
voicelines.Idle - EN: The meals here are pretty good. I don't need to repay my debts here. Also, the landlord can't just barge in. Nice, nice... It's decided, I'm not leaving!
voicelines.Idle - JP: ここは食事も美味しいし、借金も返さなくていいし、大家さんも入ってこないし……うん、もうここから出ないわ！
voicelines.Idle - KR: 여기 밥 잘 나오네! 빚도 안 갚아도 되고, 집주인도 못 들어오고, 좋은데? 음… 나 안 나갈래~
voicelines.Idle - CN: 这儿伙食不错，还不用还债，房东也进不来，挺好……嗯，我就不出去了！
voicelines.Idle - TW: 這伙食不錯，還不用還債，房東也進不來，挺好……嗯，我就不出去了！
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Oh? How unusual. Are you taking the lead today? In that case, let's have some fun...
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: へぇ？そんなに積極的なんだったら、ちゃんと遊んであげるわ。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 음? 모처럼 네가 이렇게 적극적이니, 내가 잘 놀아주지!
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 哦？难得你这么主动，我就好好陪你玩玩吧~
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 哦？難得你這麼主動，我就好好陪你玩玩吧。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Are you so eager to be close to me? Oh my, such an honest kid.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: そんなにあたしとお近づきになりたい？ふ～ん、素直でいい子じゃないの。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 나한테 그렇게 가까이 다가오고 싶었어? 참, 솔직한 아이구나.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 你就这么想接近我吗？哎呀，真是个坦率的好孩子。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 你就這麼想接近我嗎？哎呀，真是個坦率的好孩子。
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: Does this count as a job? You know the drill, I don't work for free.
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: あたしへの依頼ってこと？いつも通り、料金がかかるわよ〜。
voicelines.Dispatch - KR: 지금 나한테 의뢰한 거야? 규정에 따라 가격 책정할 거야~
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 这算是给我的委托吗？按老规矩，要计费哦~
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 這算是給我的委託嗎？按老規矩，要計費哦~
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Phew... Should have asked K.K. to settle this for me...
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: ふー、やっぱりK.K.に頼んでおけばよかったわ……。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 후우… 이런 일은 K.K.가 알아서 해줘야 하는데…
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 呼——真该让蔻蔻帮我搞定这事儿……
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 唉——真該讓K.K.幫我搞定這事……
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Whatever you say, whatever you need.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: はいはいはい。必要ならいいわ。
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 行行行，如果你需要的话。
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 行行行，如果你需要的話。
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Handsy. Fancy going for a ride with me, Chief?
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: 本当に落ち着きがないわね。どうしたの？あたしとドライブにでも行きたいの？
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 왜? 국장도 나랑 같이 바람 좀 쐬러 나갈래?
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 嗯，真不安分，怎么，局长想跟我兜个风么？
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 真不安分，怎麼，局長想跟我出去兜兜風嗎？

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: So you finally found out. Don't be shocked. Syndicate has quite a few dank rats lurking in the dark. Someone's got to deal with them. It's really no trouble for me.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: とうとう見つかっちゃったのね。驚かないで。シンジケートって、闇に潜む陰湿なネズミがいっぱいいるのよ。誰かが片づけないといけないから、成り行きであたしがやってるだけ。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 결국 들켜버렸네. 놀랄 것 없어, 신디케이트 어두운 그림자 속에 숨어 사는 시궁쥐가 얼마나 많은 줄 알아? 난 그저 누군가 처리해야 할 일을 맡았을 뿐이야.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 终究还是被你发现了。不用惊讶，辛迪加有不少藏在暗处的阴湿老鼠，总得有人处理，我只是顺手为之罢了。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 終究還是被你發現了。不用驚訝，辛迪加有不少藏在暗處的陰濕老鼠，總得有人處理，我只是順手為之罷了。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: You're finally back. I stayed here and didn't go out all this time when you were gone... Oh, you want to know about the stain on my cloak? Che accidentally spilled water on it. Yeah, that must be it.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: ようやく戻ってきたわね。きみがいない間、あたしはずっとここで大人しく待ってたのよ……えっ、マントに何かついてる？澈がうっかり水をこぼしたのね。うん、きっとそう。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 드디어 왔군. 네가 없는 동안 계속 여기서 기다렸다고. 절대 돌아다니거나 한 적도 없어… 뭐? 망토에 뭐가 묻어 있다고? 치이가 실수로 물이라도 흘렸나 보지. 암, 그렇고말고.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 终于回来啦。你不在的时候，我可是一直待在这儿，绝对没有出去瞎晃悠……呃，斗篷上沾了什么？澈不小心洒出来的水吧。对，一定是这样。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 終於回來啦。你不在的時候，我可是一直待在這，絕對沒有出去瞎晃悠……呃，斗篷上沾了什麼？澈不小心灑出來的水吧。對，一定是這樣。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Errands? What errands would a decent person have this late... I simply enjoy walking around at night. Yup, that's all.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 依頼かって？こんな時間にわざわざ依頼してくる人なんていないわよ……深夜の散歩があたしの趣味なの。うん、そういうことにしておいて。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 의뢰? 멀쩡한 사람이라면 야밤에 의뢰를 받을 리가 없잖아… 한밤중에 돌아다니는 건 그냥 내 취미일 뿐이야. 응, 그렇게 알고 있으면 돼.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 委托？正经人谁在晚上做委托啊……大半夜闲逛只是我的个人爱好。嗯，你就当是这样吧。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 委託？正經人誰在晚上做委託啊……大半夜閒逛只是我的個人愛好。嗯，你就當是這樣吧。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: There is a restaurant nearby. Their braised beef goes well with wine. Let's grab a drink together?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: 近くにいい店があるの。あそこの牛肉煮込み、美味しくてお酒が進むのよ。1杯どう？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 근처에 아는 식당이 있는데, 거기 수육이 완전 술 도둑이거든. 어때, 같이 한잔하러 갈래?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 我知道附近有家馆子，他们家的卤牛肉特别下酒。怎么样，一起去喝一杯？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 我知道附近有家館子，他們家的滷牛肉特別下酒。怎麼樣，一起去喝一杯？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: With how sad steps, O Moon, thou climb'st in the skies... What a beautiful night to sweep away vice.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: 清風明月人の管する無し、并せて作すは南楼一夜の涼……こんないい夜、悪党を片づけるのに相応しいわ。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 바람과 달은 사람의 손을 타지 않으니, 남쪽에서 불어오는 바람은 시원하고도 자유롭구나… 이렇게 좋은 밤에 악을 청산한다니, 이보다 더 좋을 수는 없구나.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 清风明月无人管，并作南楼一味凉……这么好的夜色，用来清理宿恶，再合适不过了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 清風明月無人管，並作南樓一味涼……這麼好的夜色，用來清理宿惡，再合適不過了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: If you slash a blade fast enough, an afterimage will linger in its place. Beautiful, isn't it?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: 素早く刀を振るうと、残像が残るの。綺麗でしょ？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 동작이 빠르면 검이 지나간 자리엔 잔상만이 남지. 아름답지 않니?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 只要动作够快，刀划过的地方就会留下残影。很美，不是吗？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 只要動作夠快，刀劃過的地方就會留下殘影。很美，不是嗎？
voicelines.Idle - EN: Hmm, this familiar stench... Is it coming from over there?
voicelines.Idle - JP: うーん、いつもの臭いは……あっち？
voicelines.Idle - CN: 嗯，熟悉的臭味……是在那边吗？
voicelines.Idle - TW: 嗯，熟悉的臭味……是在那邊嗎？
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Is this meant to... surveil me? Which do you think is faster, the speed of my movement or the blink of your eye?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: これは……あたしを監視するつもり？じゃあ、きみのまばたきとあたしの動き、どっちが早いか勝負しよう？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 나를… 딱 붙어서 감시할 셈이야? 어디 한번 네 눈꺼풀이 깜빡이는 속도가 빠른지, 내 움직임이 빠른지 볼까?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 这是打算……贴身监视我吗？你猜，是你的眼皮眨得快，还是我的动作快？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 這是打算……貼身監視我嗎？你猜，是你的眼皮眨得快，還是我的動作快？
voicelines.Level Up - EN: The faster the blade, the fewer problems there are.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 刀が鋭くなるほど、厄介事が減るの。
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: These hair accessories all have their own purposes. Be careful not to cut your hands.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: これらの髪飾りには、色んな使い道があるのよ。手を切らないように気をつけてね。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 그 비녀들은 다 각각의 쓰임새가 있으니까 조심해서 다뤄.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 这些发簪配饰可都有各自的用途，小心割着手哦。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 這些髮簪配飾可都有各自的用途，小心割著手哦。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Believe me, I've really been to the sea! I chartered a luxury yacht and found a lot of treasures there... (Chuckles) K.K. and Che were there, too! They can vouch for me!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 本当に海に行ったことあるんだから。信じてよ。あの時は豪華なクルーザーを貸し切って、お宝をザクザク引き上げたわ……K.K.と澈が証人よ！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 진짜 바닷가에 가봤다니까? 왜 안 믿지? 그때 호화로운 요트를 빌렸는데, 거기서 보물을 엄청나게 많이 낚았어… K.K.랑 치이도 있었어. 그 애들이 증인이야!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 我真去过海边，别不信。我当时包了一条豪华游艇，在那里打捞到了很多财宝……蔻蔻和澈也在，他们可以作证！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 我真去過海邊，別不信。我當時包了一條豪華遊艇，在那裡打撈到了很多財寶……K.K.和澈也在，他們可以作證！
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Done resting? Let's head out, then. There are still lots of treasures at the bottom of the sea waiting for us to salvage.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: ちゃんと休めた？よく休んでから出発しましょ。海の底には、まだまだ沢山の宝物が引き上げられるのを待ってるのよ。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 다 쉬었어? 그럼 출발하자. 수많은 보물이 바다 밑에서 날 기다리고 있다고.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 休息够了？休息够了就出发吧。海底还有很多宝物等着咱们去捞呢。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 休息夠了？休息夠了就出發吧。海底還有很多寶物等著咱們去撈呢。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: You know, my boat back then was unparalleled. Powerful, luxurious, and decked out with every gadget you can possibly imagine... What's that look? Don't believe that I used to be rich?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 当時のあたしの船は……ふふん、パワフルで豪華で、色んな施設が揃ってたわ……ちょっと、その反応どういう意味？昔は金持ちだったのよ。いけない？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 그 시절 내 요트는… 후훗, 힘도 좋고, 내부도 화려했어. 그리고 각종 옵션이 다 있었지… 뭐야? 난 뭐, 부자였으면 안 돼?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 当时我那条船啊……哼哼，动力强劲，内饰豪华，各种配件应有尽有……你什么意思，不许我以前阔过？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 當時我那條船啊……哼哼，動力強勁，裝潢豪華，各種配件應有盡有……你什麼意思，不許我以前闊過？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: It can get dangerous at times on the sea. There are storms, pirates, and sharks. But fear not. To me, those are just little hiccups on the road to fortune.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: 海には時々、危険なことがあるわ。嵐とか海賊とか、あとサメも。でも、怖がらなくていいわよ。このハクイツの前では、金持ちへの道の小話みたいなものよ。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 바다도 때로는 위험해. 해일이며, 해적이며, 상어 같은 것까지… 하지만 무서워할 것 없어. 이 백 님 앞에서는 부자가 되는 길에 생긴 작은 에피소드에 불과하니까.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 海上偶尔也会有些危险，风暴啊、海盗啊还有鲨鱼啊什么的。但是不用害怕，在我白逸面前，那都不过是发财路上的小插曲而已。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 海上偶爾也會有些危險，風暴啊、海盜啊還有鯊魚啊什麼的。但是不用害怕，在我白逸面前，那都不過是發財路上的小插曲而已。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: Can I swim? Ha! I can swim like a little mermaid, so fast, so graceful! Anyone sees that should pay me. You'll understand once I get into the water.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: あたしの泳ぐ姿といえば、羞月閉花、花鳥諷泳、泳姿颯爽よ！……後で海に入れば分かるわ。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 내가 수영하는 모습은 그야말로 아름다운 용이 잔잔한 바다에 뛰어들었다가, 갓 피어난 연꽃처럼 솟아오르는 것만 같지. 이따 내가 물에 들어가면 알게 될 거야.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 我的泳姿，那可真是游龙入海海晏河清清水芙蓉……等会儿我下水你就知道了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 我的泳姿，那可真是游龍入海海晏河清清水芙蓉……等會我下水你就知道了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: Phew, the sun is scorching. I'm getting all hot and sweaty... Aww, how come you're blushing?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: はぁ、太陽が眩しいわね～。暑い暑い。汗だくよ……あら？どうして顔が赤いのかしら～？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 후, 해가 정말 뜨겁네. 너무 더워서 땀이… 어머, 국장? 지금 얼굴 빨개진 거야?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 呼，太阳真大，好热好热，都出汗了……哟，你的脸怎么红啦~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 呼，太陽真大，好熱好熱，都出汗了……喲，你的臉怎麼紅啦~
voicelines.Idle - EN: Ah... Take a nap on the deck if you're tired. The sun is so warm, and the sea breeze feels so nice...
voicelines.Idle - JP: 疲れたら、甲板で寝ていいわよ。ちょうど日差しが暖かいし、海風に吹かれるのも気持ちいいしね……
voicelines.Idle - KR: 힘들면 갑판에서 한숨 자. 마침 햇빛도 따숩고 바닷바람도 포근하네…
voicelines.Idle - CN: 啊~累了的话，就在甲板上睡觉吧。正好阳光这么暖和，海风吹着也很舒服……
voicelines.Idle - TW: 啊~累了的話，就在甲板上睡覺吧。正好陽光這麼暖和，海風吹著也很舒服……
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: All right, all hands on deck. We're heading to deeper waters!
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: よし、船員は持ち場につけ。深海へ出発するぞ～！
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 자, 모든 선원은 자리로! 이제 깊은 바다로 떠나볼까!
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 好了，所有水手就位。那我们要向深海进发咯！
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 好了，所有水手就位。那我們要向深海進發囉！
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Hehe, afterwards, I found even more treasures.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: それから、あたしはもっとお宝を見つけたの。
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 그다음에는 훨씬 더 많은 보물을 찾아냈지.
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 然后啊，我就找到了更多的财宝。
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 然後啊，我就找到了更多的財寶。
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: When you're alone on a boat with a hot babe like me, your imagination is bound to run wild. It's fine, I forgive you.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: うんうん、あたしみたいな美女と船で二人きりになったら、ちょっと邪な気持ちになっても仕方ないわね。いいわ、許してあげる。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 흐음, 나처럼 아름다운 여인과 한 배에 단둘이 있으니 이상한 생각이 들 만도 하지. 기분이다, 이번 한 번은 용서해 줄게.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 啧啧啧，和我这样的大美女在同一条船上单独相处，难免有点小想法。好吧，原谅你了。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 嘖嘖嘖，和我這樣的大美女在同一條船上單獨相處，難免有點小想法。好吧，原諒你了。
